item.title: How to Use Fully Qualified Tablenames in Dbplyr
item.description: SQL Databases I have only a working knowledge of databases and also more from a theoretical point of view rather than a deep understanding of the details of the respective implementation. That is, I know what normalization is (and why it is a good thing) and how to do SELECT or JOIN queries, but when it comes to the technical details of the different SQL flavors my knowledge dwindles away.
